pages.text: Ravens are dark birds that can be found in plains and forests. When killed, they will drop Feathers.$(br2)Ravens can be tamed with Gold Nuggets or Silver Nuggets, and bred with Wheat Seeds.

Ravens can be bound as $(l:bewitchment:rituals/binding)Familiars$(), enabling the witch to occasionally reflect $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Curses$().$(br2)Raven $(l:bewitchment:rituals/binding)Familiars$() also double the duration of $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Curses$() cast by the witch, making them much more effective.
